title: The Day begins
creator_credit: Keystone Film Company and Charles Chaplin
brief_description: Unable to play his part, Charlie is thrown out of the movie studio. In his efforts to return he disguises himself as a woman, causing havoc for the film crew and landing him in deep water ending with a chase through the Keystone sets. Cast includes Chester Conklin, Roscoe (Fatty) Arbuckle, Charles Murray.
